data.title: BEEDY Family Association Member Directory
data.meta_description: Others researching the Bede, Beede, Beedy surname
data.text:
Descendants of Eli BEDEE

Eli had six children, as follows:

Hezekiah (1725-1801)

Daniel (1729-1799)

Jonathan (1734-1825)

Thomas (1737-1806)

Johanna (1738-1789)

Elizabeth (1739-1821)

THE PEOPLE LISTED BELOW ARE GROUPED BY CHILD.

Click HERE for the list of those who still haven't connected to Eli.

DESCENDANTS OF HEZEKIAH (1725-1801) Ray Lincoln BEEDE lives in Scotia, NY. He is the son of Hugh Stevenson7 who was descended from Fred Alger6, George Washington5, Aaron4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Richard Pierce SIBLEY lives in Chester, NH. His line begins with his mother, Elinore8 GRAVES Sibley and continues with Lilla G.7 BEEDE Graves, James R.6 BEEDE, Silas Madison5, Aaron4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Mark T. BEEDY lives in Thief River Falls, MN. His paper line is David8, Esper7, George Lingle6, Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Sandra R. BEEDY Kruse lives in Omak, WA. Her line is Grant7, George Lingle6, Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Michael W. PETERSON lives in Lino Lakes, MN. His line is Pamela8 BEEDY Peterson, Grant7, George Lingle6, Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Rachel BURLAND Johnson lives in Hugo, MN. Her line is Ronald Robert8 BURLAND, Nora Mae7 BEEDY Burland, George Lingle6, Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Linda Gail Owens lives in Linneus, MO.

LINEAGE: Eli Beede-1699-1789 (m) Mehitable Sleeper-1701-1768 > Hezekiah Beede 1725-1801 (m) Hephisba Smith 1727-1772 > Bezaleel Beede 1759-1820 (m) Judith Morgan 1765-1839 > Daniel Aaron Beede 1799-1877 (m) Sarah Johnson 1798-1878 > John L. Beede 1871-1899 (m) Abiah Ann Courtright 1839-1930 > George L. Beedy 1871-1955 (m) Louise P. Eckhart 1881-1951 > Florence Beedy 1921-1994 (m) Robert L. Paulus 1917-1976 > Linda G. Owens 1946 and still counting.

COMMENTS: Can't find any info on Judith Morgan, can anyone help? Todd BEEDY lives in Troy, MO. His line is Bernard Langdon "Bernie"8,Langdon William "Bud"7, Samuel Enon6, Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Jill A. BEEDY Shreve lives in Carol Stream, IL. Her line is Bernard Langdon "Bernie"8,Langdon William "Bud"7, Samuel Enon6, Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. She is the sister of Todd, above. Peggy SULLIVAN lives in Frankfort, IL. Her line is Elaine WILLS Wolf8, Florence BEEDY Wills7, Samuel Enon6,Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Sandra A. WILLS lives in Arizona. Her line is Harriet A. WILLS8, Florence BEEDY Wills7, Samuel Enon6,Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1 Michael John HODOLITZ Sr. lives in Woodland, IL. His line is John R. HODOLITZ9, Harriet A. WILLS8, Florence BEEDY Wills7, Samuel Enon6,Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1 He is the nephew of Sandra WILLS above. Sue-Ellen BARKELL St. Pierre lives in Clinton, ME. Her line is Howard William BARKELL8,Ellen Marie BEEDY Barkell7, Samuel Enon6,Langdon John5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Daniel Mark BEEDY lives in Newton, MA. His line is Dennis Wayne8, Henry Savoie7, Vennis George6, Henry Joseph5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. John P. HATCH, Ph.D. lives in San Antonio, TX. He is descended from Daniel A.4 through his son Charles Wesley5 and Charles' daughter Izora6. Robert Beedy COLVILLE is the son of Anna Mary BEEDY and James Daniel COLVILLE. His line is Anna Mary7, Arthur Austin6, Austin Daniel5, Daniel A.4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Jack W. RALPH lives in Carson City, NV. His line is Gloria Irene9 NELSON Ralph [his Mother], Irene Lillian8 DAVENPORT Nelson, Sarah May7 PHILBRICK Davenport, Orval Henry6 PHILBRICK, Mercy Ann5 BEEDY Philbrick, Daniel A.4 BEEDY, Bezaleel3 BEEDE, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Donald D. FREEMAN was born in DeSmet, SD and currently lives in Willow Street, PA where he is an ordained minister with the United Church of Christ, and a seminary professor. His BEEDY line begins with his mother, Berniece Emma8 PHILBRICK Freeman, Nathaniel "Nat" Edward7 PHILBRICK, Orval Henry6 PHILBRICK, Mercy Ann5 BEEDY Philbrick, Daniel A.4 BEEDY, Bezaleel3 BEEDE, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Debbie GEMMILL lives in Stonewall, Manitoba, Canada. Her grandmother, Margaret J. BEEDY Stewart was born in Peotone, IL in 1898 to Daniel H. BEEDY and Lucy Jane GEORGE. Debbie believes Daniel H. is the son of Nathan S. BEEDY5 and Phoebe GOODSPEED and the grandson of Daniel A.4 Daniel H. and Lucy moved to Stonewall, Manitoba in 1904 where he lived until his death in 1949. Chuck RAPP lives in Gresham, OR. His line is Ida May BEEDY6, Norman J.5, John4 (brother of Daniel A.4), Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1 Patrick Lee JAQUES lives in Elizabeth City, NC. His line is Lee Gordon JAQUES8, Hazel LAWRENCE Jaques7, Alta BEEDE Lawrence6, Elisha Smith BEEDE5, Aaron Stiles4, Hezekiah (Rosia/Rezia)3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. David George BEEDY lives in San Bernardino, CA. His line is George Alfred BEEDY Jr.8, George Alfred Sr.7, Wilbur P.6, Abram Partridge5, Aaron Stiles4, Hezekiah (Rosia/Rezia)3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. NOTE: Based on David's DNA, Abram is not genetically related to Aaron. More research is underway. Karen BERNARD lives in Geneva, Switzerland. Her line is Ida May BEEDY6, Norman J.5, John4, Bezaleel3, Hezekiah2, Eli1

COMMENTS: Ida May BEEDY married John Anson FINNEY in Postville, Allamakee Co, IA on 5 Nov 1879.(He was a descendant of John FINNEY of the Plymouth Colony). He was b. 5 Feb 1858 in Elizabethtown, Essex Co, NY and d. 27 Feb 1838 in Alhambra, LA Co, CA. He was a grocer and later a traveling salesman for Sperry Flour Company. They had 3 daughters: Edith Pearl FINNEY7 (16 Aug 1880 Magregor, Clayton Co, IA - 7 May 1971 LaVerne, CA), Lois Maria (12 Dec 1882 Postville, IA - 12 May 1965 Torrence, CA), and Lucy "Lulu" (12 Dec 1888 Wichita, KA- 24 Dec 1974 Alhambra, CA). (Edith) Pearl FINNEY married Rev. Charles Augustus KENT 16 Aug 1904 in So. Pasadena, CA. They had 6 children: Oliver Finney (1905-1979), Lois Rae (1906-1985), (John) Russell (1910-1984), Ruth Pearl (1913-2002), Esther Lorraine (1918-1986), and (Miriam) Persis KENT (1919-living). I am the middle daughter of (John) Russell KENT & Doris Dorotha REDFERN (1911-2005). Mary Johanna PELLAND McGuire lives in Akron, OH. Her line is:

Eli1

Hezekiah2

Phineas3 Beede (24Sept1779-1806) m. Sarah Bachelder(1754-?)

William4 Beede (15Apr1779 in Poplin/Fremont, NH-17Feb 1831 in Levant, ME) m. to Mary Banks

John5 Beede (1811-1896) m. to Caroline Brown (b. 1814 in Auburn, ME; d. 1830 in Wisconsin

Wm. M.6 Beede (1844 in Levant, ME-1898 in Wisconsin?) m. to Sara Ann (Sullivan) Beede b. Dublin, Ireland 1842, given land under 1862 Homestead Act, d. 1934 in Wisconsin.

Elizabeth Ann7 Beede (Hagen) Weber b. Taylor Falls, MN, 8Feb1874, d. Akron, OH, 19Jan55 m. Oscar Hagen (1867-1933)

Sara Johanna8 Hagen (29July1897 in Wisconsin-16June1953 in Akron, OH) m Lawrence W. Pelland (19Jan1897 in Duluth,MN-14Jan1953 in Akron, OH),

Father Joseph L.9 Pelland (30July1922, Akron, OH-30August1998, Akron, OH) m. Katie Ann Bratanov (12Jan1924, Akron, OH-6Dec1992, Akron, OH)

COMMENTS: "I have pictures of Phineas Beede's grave...on a private family plot on Beede Hill in Fremont, NH. Also have pictures of some other Beede gravesites in that plot and at a public cemetery in Fremont.

Fremont, NH, is BEAUTIFUL!!! (And there's a GREAT pizzaria/family restaurant there, too!)" Catherine Linda CHADWICK EDDY lives in Irvine, KY. Her line is:

10 Catherine Linda CHADWICK EDDY

9 Stella Adelaide HENDERSON CHADWICK

8 Stella Ruth ADDINGTON HENDERSON CHENEVERT

7 Kate Augusta BEEDE ADDINGTON

6 John Charles BEEDE

5 John BEEDE

4 William BEEDE

3 Phineas BEEDE

2 Hezekiah BEEDE

1 Eli BEEDE

COMMENTS: Two brick walls I have come across in my research are:

1) Who were the parents of Caroline Augusta Cooper, Kate Augusta BEEDE's mother?

and

2) What became of Stella Ruth ADDINGTON HENDERSON CHENEVERT's first husband, Forrest Morgan HENDERSON who disappeared in about 1912?

Somewhere I have a picture that includes Kate Augusta BEEDE ADDINGTON, but not sure where. Would enjoy sharing info with cousins! I have visited the ancestral BEEDE farm in WI. Molly Porterfield lives in Portland, OR. She is the daughter of Margaret Carol BEEDE Porterfield and granddaughter of Charles Victor BEEDE who was the son of Isaac A. of ME and back through Joshua P. (m. Hannah Annis/Avery); William B. (m. Mary Banks); Phineas (m. Sarah Mary Bachelder); Hezekiah (m. Hepsibah Smith); and finally Eli (m. Mehitable Sleeper).

COMMENTS: I would love to contact anyone who has knowledge or advice in finding more connections with this BEEDE line.

Marc BROWN lives in Valparaiso, IN. His 4th Great Grandmother, Rhoda BEEDE5, married Jacob Brown. Rhoda was the daughter of William BEEDE4, who was the son of Phineas BEEDE3, who was the son of Hezekiah BEEDE2, who was the son of Eli1. Timothy Gilman BEEDE lives in Merrimac, MA. He is the grandson of Dana B. BEEDE7 of Levant, ME, who is descended from Gilman H.6, William5, William4, Phineas3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Wyant BEEDE lives in Beedeville, AR. He is the son of Jasper A.8 BEEDE who was descended from Joseph A. Jr,7 Joseph A. Sr.6 (1875-1946), William Harrison5 (1837-1894), Addison C.4, Jeremiah3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. He was co-producer of "The Beede Book". Alex Wyant BEEDE lives in Pocahontas, AR. He is the oldest son of Wyant9 BEEDE [above] who is descended from Jasper A.8 BEEDE, Joseph A. Jr,7 Joseph A. Sr.6 (1875-1946), William Harrison5 (1837-1894), Addison C.4, Jeremiah3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Wyant Alexander BEEDE lives in Thayer, MO. He is the youngest son of Alex Wyant10 BEEDE [above], the son of Wyant9 BEEDE [above] who is descended from Jasper A.8 BEEDE, Joseph A. Jr,7 Joseph A. Sr.6 (1875-1946), William Harrison5 (1837-1894), Addison C.4, Jeremiah3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Maya Gail BEEDE lives in Pocahontas, AR. She is the oldest daughter of Alex Wyant10 BEEDE [above], the son of Wyant9 BEEDE [above] who is descended from Jasper A.8 BEEDE, Joseph A. Jr,7 Joseph A. Sr.6 (1875-1946), William Harrison5 (1837-1894), Addison C.4, Jeremiah3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Adonis BEEDE lives in Warm Springs, AR. He is the second son of Wyant9 BEEDE [above] who is descended from Jasper A.8 BEEDE, Joseph A. Jr,7 Joseph A. Sr.6 (1875-1946), William Harrison5 (1837-1894), Addison C.4, Jeremiah3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. Bettye (Carla) BEEDE Mascorro lives in Liberty, TX. She is the daughter of Jasper A.8 BEEDE who was descended from Joseph A. Jr,7 Joseph A. Sr.6 (1875-1946), William Harrison5 (1837-1894), Addison C.4, Jeremiah3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. She is the younger sister of Wyant BEEDE [above]. Bruce Osgood FERLAND lives in Rochester, NH. His lineage is (1) Eli + Mehitable Sleeper, (2) Hezikiah + Hepzibah Smith, (3) Phineas + Sarah Bachelder, (4) Phineas Jr. + Miriam Taylor, (5) Horatio + Hanna Fellows, (6) Phineas B. + Ann R. Levitt, (7) Charles Ellsworth + Lula Sanborn, (8) Mary B. + George N. Osgood, (9) Alberta Osgood (3 Apr 1915-7 Apr 2006} + Robert W. Ferland (12 Dec 1912-25 Feb 1984), (10) Bruce Osgood Ferland (himself). Steven Walter BEEDE lives in Chester, NJ. His lineage is Donald W.9 BEEDE, Joseph W.8, Herbert B.7, Phineas B.6, Horatio5, Phineas4, Phineas3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. David Alan BEEDE lives in Lucerne Valley, CA. His lineage is Verde Cyrus BEEDE Jr.10, Verde Cyrus Sr.9, Cyrus T.8, George Ferdinand7, Orrin Edson6, Phineas5, Jonathan4, Phineas3, Hezekiah2, Eli1. DESCENDANTS OF DANIEL (1729-1799) Barry A. BEEDY lives in Daphne, AL. His line is Hilliard BEEDY8, Everett Rufus7, Rufus Smith6, Isaac5, Nathan4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Drew Frederic Pratt Beedy was born in Portland, ME. His line is Richard Viles9, Paul Drew8, Oscar Leander7, Rufus Smith6, Isaac5, Nathan4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Leslie BEEDE Quist lives in Yakima, WA. She is descended from Fred Bryan8 (her father), Edgar Lesley7, John Currier6, Samuel Gilman5, Peter4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Cheryl CREEGER lives in Luverne, MN. Her line is Elizabeth "Lizzie" BEEDE6, Samuel Gilman5, Peter4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Melissa Nelson ZUCKER lives in Oakland, CA. Her line is through her grandmother Clara SAUTER9, Nellie BEEDE Sauter8, Leroy John7, John Currier6, Samuel Gilman5, Peter4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Richard A. BAKER lives in Rindge, NH. His line is Henry H. BAKER8, Lenora HUTCHINS Baker7, Sarah BEEDE Hutchins6, Samuel Gilman5, Peter4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Kathleen Ann GETTO lives in Topeka, KS. Her line is Patricia A. BEEDY Theis9, Harry Burton BEEDY8, John Burton7, James6, Frederick Eveleth5, Daniel III4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Carly PETERSON lives in College Station, TX. Her BEEDY/BEEDE line begins with her 3rd great grandmother Lura Ella6 BEEDY Schliem, and continues with Frederick Eveleth5, Daniel III4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Heather WITHAM lives in Denver, CO. Her line is Wendy10 WITHAM, Warren9 WITHAM, William8 WITHAM, Jennie7 BEEDE Witham, James6, Frederick Eveleth5, Daniel III4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Betty GOWER lives in Centennial, CO. Her line is Norma Marie8 SMEDLEY Gower, Mabel Clair7 EVERSOLL Smedley, Abbie Caroline6 BEEDY Eversoll, Joseph Eveleth5 BEEDY, Daniel III4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Janet Susan SMEDLEY lives in Ogden, UT. Her line is Melbern Samuel8 SMEDLEY, Mabel Clair7 EVERSOLL Smedley, Abbie Caroline6 BEEDY Eversoll, Joseph Eveleth5 BEEDY, Daniel III4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Suzanne Virginia SIMMERS Sawyer lives in Black Creek, British Columbia, Canada. Her line begins with her mother Helen Virginia8 ROBISON Simmers and continues with Mabel Edith7 BEEDY Robison, Daniel6 BEEDY, Joseph Eveleth5, Daniel III4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. April Nelson lives in Randolph, MA. Her line starts from her great grandmother:

7) Ester Mae Beede 1894 Chelsea MA-1942, Lynn Ma, wife of Earl L Fuller

6) Frank Beede 1872-1910 Chelsea MA, husband of Gertrude Roberts

5) James Eveleth Beede 1814-?, husband of Adelaide Melanson

4) Daniel Beede III 1784-1864, husband of Polly Eveleth

3) Daniel Beede II 1752-1792, husband of Dolly Hackett

2) Daniel Beede 1729-1799, husband of Patience Prescott

1) Eli Beede 1699-1789, husband of Mehitable Sleeper Ronald B. and Barbara (VARNEY) BEEDY live in Livermore, ME. Ron is a retired History Teacher, and Barb (originally from Turner, ME) is a Middle School Teacher. They are both descended from Eli the Emigrant. Ron's line is Bradford8, Freeland7, Laforrest6, Aaron5, Aaron4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Barb's line is Warren VARNEY7, G. W. VARNEY6, G. F. VARNEY5, Beede VARNEY4, Sarah BEEDE Varney3, Daniel2, Eli1. Rachel Elizabeth Hardy Tose Herrick lives in Lynn, MA. Her line begins with her mother Marion Alda9 GEORGE Hardy and continues with Ruth Alma8 SARGENT George, Charles Aden7 SARGENT, Vesta6 LUFKIN Sargent, Hannah P.5 BEEDY Lufkin, Aaron Hackett4 BEEDE, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1.

COMMENTS: This site is the only place I've been able to find Hannah's parentage, I would love to have additional sources for her. Also, I have a marriage connection as my ggm is Emma Rowe. Her parents were Louisa Anna Plaisted and Lewis Phillipe Plaisted Rowe who later married Sarah E Beedy. Ronald J. TURNER lives in Haverhill, MA. His line is Luther French TURNER II8, Luther Esand7, Oscar Melvin6, Luther French5, Dorothy "Dolly" BEEDE4 [who married Soloman TURNER], Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Florence Ann TURNER Dubuc lives in Hooksett, NH. Her line is Luther French TURNER II8, Luther Esand7, Oscar Melvin6, Luther French5, Dorothy "Dolly" BEEDE4 [who married Soloman TURNER], Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Theresa Ann FRIEDERICH lives in San Diego, CA. Her line is Norine HASKIN Frederich9, Alfred James HASKIN8, Mary Jane "Mayme" JONES Haskin7, Jane Cynthia TURNER Jones6, Hiram Beede TURNER5, Dorothy "Dolly" BEEDE Turner4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Kathleen TICKNOR Lawless lives in San Antonio, TX. Her line is Laurel Jeanne BLANEY Ticknor9, Hazel Morley HASKIN Blaney8, Mary Jane JONES Haskin7, Jane Cynthia TURNER Jones6, Hiram Beede TURNER5, Dorothy "Dolly" BEEDE Turner4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. Cynthia Jane CRISMON Sutton lives in Aurora, CO. Her line is Twila Marie LIND Crismon8, Mabel Ann JONES Lind7, Jane Cynthia TURNER Jones6, Hiram Beede TURNER5, Dorothy "Dolly" BEEDE4, Daniel Jr.3, Daniel2, Eli1. William Edwards BARNES lives in Portland, OR. His lineage goes through Dorothy BEEDE and Solomon TURNER. William9 BARNES > Eunice8 CHAPMAN > Mabel7 HAFF > Matilda6 ALDEN > Ruhama French5 TURNER who married Elisha ALDEN > Dorothy4 BEEDE who married Solomon TURNER > Daniel II3 who married Dorothy HACKETT > Daniel I2 who married Patience PRESCOTT > Eli1. Susan D. ENGLE lives in Ann Arbor, MI. Her lineage begins with her grandmother Alma8 COX and continues through Abbie7 HAFF, Matilda6 ALDEN, Ruhamah French5 TURNER, Dorothy1 BEEDE4, Daniel BEEDE Jr.3, Daniel BEEDE2, Eli1. Carol Moeller lives in Salem, OR. Her line is Viola6 ALDEN, who married William Bainbridge Staples, then Ruhamah French5 TURNER Alden, Dorothy1 BEEDE4, Daniel BEEDE Jr.3, Daniel BEEDE2, Eli1. Judi ASSONY lives in Bend, OR. Her line is Mary BEEDE5, Joseph4, Joshua3, Daniel2, Eli1. Summer Amber LEAO lives in Vancouver, WA. Her line begins with her mother, Robin BERRY10 Leao, then goes to Leo Gail BERRY9, Urith Leona COITEUX8 Berry, Edith Melissa CHURCH7 Coiteux, Azro B.6 CHURCH, Mary BEEDE5 Church, Joseph4, Joshua3, Daniel2, Eli1. Deborah SPANGLER Waite lives in Clifton Springs, NY. Her line begins with her mother, Rosalie9 CHURCH Spangler, George Dewey8 CHURCH, William A.7 CHURCH, Azro B.6 CHURCH, Mary5 BEEDE Church, Joseph4, Joshua3, Daniel2, Eli1. Lynn Leroy STEWARTwas born Leon Leroy BEEDE Jr. and currently lives in Gastonia, NH. His line is Leon Leroy BEEDE Sr.8, Charles F.7, Fred A.6, William Penn5, Elijah4, Nathan3, Daniel2, Eli1. George Paul GERVAIS was born in Waterville, ME and currently lives in Lucca, Italy. His line is his father, George Paul8 BEEDE-GERVAIS [whose surname was changed from BEEDE to GERVAIS via adoption], Frank7, Frank P.6, Valentine5, Elijah4, Nathan3, Daniel2, Eli1. Stephen J. BEEDE was born in Boston, MA, and currently lives in Sacramento, CA.

LINEAGE:

Father: Francis (Frank) Robert Beede b: 7/22/10 Boston, d: 7/20/1952, Boston.

Grandfather: Frank Rex Beede b: 1880 Lynn, MA, d: 7/22/1929, Married Mary Veronica Cashman, b: 1888, Boston, died 1967: Children: Francis Robert (1910); Earnest; Warren (b 1913); Doris; Paul (b: 1916).

Great Grandfather: Franklin P. Beede?? b: 10/5/1854 Lynn, MA.

COMMENTS: In my sister Jane's birth page (1948), my father is referenced as Francis Robert Beede; his father as Frank R. Beede; and his Grandfather as Franklin P Beede.

It seems too coincidental that the Franklin P. Beede b: 10/5/1854 in Lynn, MA might not be the same as Franklin Pierce Beede born in Lynn, MA at about the same time. If this is the same man, then the lineage runs back to Eli through Valentine; Elijah; Nathan; and Judge Daniel. Paula MASSIE Oneal lives in Arcadia, FL. Her line is John Edward Millar MASSIE9, Gertrude Lilian MILLAR8, Delia Attila BORIGHT7, Anna Maria HOSKIN6, Tamzin BEEDE5, Daniel4, Nathan3, Daniel2, Eli1. Elizabeth Anne "Beth" ZARING lives in Wellston, OH. Her line is Robert Wesley ZARING8, Abby Beede CLAYTON7, Mary Caroline BEEDE6, Cyrus BEEDE5, Stephen4, Cyrus3, Daniel2, Eli1. Beth's cousin, Jim HUFF8 (Martha Clayton7, Mary Caroline Beede6, etc.) has been a very active genealogist in her family. He organized a family reunion in 1999 in Sandwich N. H. for the grandkids of Abby7 and Martha7. Don KELLEY lives in Tucson, AZ. His line is William Clarkson KELLEY7 (his father), Laura Ruth PICKARD6, Laura Emma HOAG5, Enoch HOAG4, Martha Phebe BEEDE3, Daniel2, Eli1. DESCENDANTS OF JONATHAN (1734-1825) John Worthing BEEDE lives in Boise, ID. He is the son of Millard Wesley7 who was descended from Bates Worthing6, John Wesley5, Caleb Sleeper4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Bret Douglas BEEDE lives in Eagle Mountain, UT. He is the son of John Worthing8 BEEDE [above], who was descended from Millard Wesley7 Bates Worthing6, John Wesley5, Caleb Sleeper4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Daren Millard BEEDE lives in Salem, OR. He is the son of David Millard8, who was descended from Millard Wesley7, Bates Worthing6, John Wesley5, Caleb Sleeper4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Lexie Jayne MOSS Foster lives in LaHabra, CA. She is the daughter of Elizabeth BEEDE7 who was descended from Bates Worthing6, John Wesley5, Caleb Sleeper4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Janet E. Delfs lives in Scottsdale, AZ. Her grandmother was Alice Worthing BEEDE Delfs, whose father was Bates Worthing6 BEEDE. The rest of her line is John Wesley5, Caleb Sleeper4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Marilyn Muerth lives in San Diego, CA. She is the daughter of Jeanne St. Mar BEEDE Muerth8 who was descended from Harry Giles7 BEEDE, Theodatus Giles6, John Wesley5, Caleb Sleeper4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Christian Dale FOX lives in Rancho Palos Verdes, CA. He is the son of Dale Joseph FOX9 (b. Youngstown, OH; currently living, Huntington Beach, CA) and his first wife Carol Dee CAMPBELL. Grandson of Ruthella GEESAMAN8 (b. Ohio, January 3, 1908; d. Aug 31, 1982, CA) and her husband Franklin Bowman FOX. Great grandson of Ethel Eliza OSBORNE7 (b. March 22, 1886, Ohio; d. Sept 11, 1972, CA) and her husband Joseph Snavely GEESAMAN. Great-great grandson of Mary Elizabeth BEEDE6 (b. Jan 5, 1863 or 1866, Youngstown, OH; d. Oct 29, 1932, Youngstown, OH) and her husband Charles Nelson OSBORNE. The rest of his BEEDE line is John Wesley5, Caleb Sleeper4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Robert Frank "Dr. Bob" BEEDE lives in Eagle, ID. His line is Thomas Wayne7 BEEDE, Elias Thomas6, Eli5, Abram4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Dale Thomas BEEDE lives in Grand Junction, CO. His line is Wayne Edward8 BEEDE, Thomas Wayne7, Elias Thomas6, Eli5, Abram4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Dillon Eli BEEDE lives in Mitchell, NE. His line is Charles Clark9 BEEDE, Charles Granville8, Clark Eli7, Simon Cooley6, Eli5, Abram4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Loretta Faye BEEDE Bassler lives in West Liberty, IA. She is the daughter of Howard Rilea BEEDE7, who is descended from Alonzo6, Eli5, Abram4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Sherry BEEDE Herron lives in Houston, TX. She is the daughter of Homer Harvey BEEDE7, who is descended from Alonzo6, Eli5, Abram4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Rebecca BEEDE lives in San Antonio, TX. She is the daughter of Gary9 BEEDE [brother of Sherry Herron above] who is descended from Alonzo6, Homer Harvey7, Eli5, Abram4, John Enos3, Jonathan2, Eli1. Harlene SOPER Brown lives in Kelso, WA. Her husband is James10 BROWN and his line through his mother is Shirlee9 RONDEAU Brown, Lucille Shirley8 THWING Rondeau, Ethel Francis7 HUNTINGTON Thwing, Susan Buzell6, MOULTON Huntington, Thomas Beede5 MOULTON, Sarah4 BEEDE Moulton, Gen. Jonathan3 BEEDE, Jonathan2, Eli1. Alice Elizabeth WIGGIN Saunders lives in Cisco, TX. She is the daughter of Gilbert Henry6 WIGGIN who is descended from Jonathan Beede5 WIGGIN, Mehitable4 BEEDE Wiggin, Gen. Jonathan3 BEEDE, Jonathan I.2, Eli1. Melody Ann WIGGIN Bergevin lives in Merrimack, NH. She is the daughter of Richard Gilbert7 WIGGIN who is descended from Richard S.6 WIGGIN , Jonathan Beede5 WIGGIN, Mehitable4 BEEDE Wiggin, Gen. Jonathan3 BEEDE, Jonathan I.2, Eli1. DESCENDANTS OF THOMAS (1737-1806)

Frank McNulty BEEDE III lives in Antioch, CA. His line is Frank McNulty Jr.8, Frank McNulty Sr.7, Charles Francis Tyler6, Henry Fuller5, Thomas4, Rev. Thomas3, Thomas2, Eli1.

Kathryn Michelle "Katie" Callahan lives in Rochester, WA. Her line is Michael James8 Callahan, Nancy Belle7 BEEDE Callahan, Charles Francis Tyler6, Henry Fuller5, Thomas4, Rev. Thomas3, Thomas2, Eli1.

Her father, Michael James Callahan, also lives in Rochester, WA and her brother, Shawn Michael Callahan, lives in Seattle.

COMMENTS: I recently purchased a small piece of land originally purchased by Albert Thomas Beede in 1884? The land fronts a road that was once named after A. T. Beede as well as the the lake (currently named Lake Geneva) which sits behind me. Both Albert Thomas and his brother George Kimball Beede were prominent citizens and Business men in Seattle in the 1880's and 1890's. Albert Thomas Beede married the twin sister of Ellen McNulty, Belinda "Belle" McNulty. I'm interested in finding out as much as I can about their time spent here in the Seattle area.

DESCENDANTS OF JOHANNA (1738-1789)

NONE SO FAR!

DESCENDANTS OF ELIZABETH (1739-1821) Karen R. BROOKS lives in Newnan, GA. Her relationship to Eli BEEDE and Mehitable BEEDE is her gg grandfather George Meader WARREN (nee George Meader HUNTOON), son of Nathaniel HUNTOON, son of Aaron HUNTOON, son of Elizabeth BEEDE2, daughter of Eli1 and Mehitable. She is also the 5th g granddaughter of Mehitable's sister, Abigail SLEEPER and Isaac FELLOWS. Robert Edwin WARREN Jr. lives in Hyannis, MA. His line to Eli is Robert Edwin8 WARREN Sr. > George Edwin7 WARREN Jr. > George Edwin6 WARREN Sr. > George Meader5 HUNTOON-WARREN Sr. > Nathaniel4 HUNTOON > Aaron3 HUNTOON > Elizabeth2 BEEDE Huntoon > Eli BEDE1.

Other BEEDE / BEEDY Cousins (Still looking for their connection to Eli)

Diane LaValley DARVILLE lives in Pensacola, FL. She has two lines in the BEEDE family, both of them stemming from her grandmother Gertie Rosan EASTMAN. Her mother was Cora (Flora) E. BEEDE, who's father was Bliss D. BEEDE, son of Alvah and Ruth (CARR) BEEDE. There is evidence to suggest that Alvah's father was a Joseph BEEDE, born 1768 in Sandwich, NH, but no proof has been found. Cora married Fred A. EASTMAN. His maternal grandparents were John and Asenath (BEEDE) FORD. Asenath was the daughter of Alvah and Ruth (CARR) BEEDE. Heather Jo BEEDY lives in Strong, ME.

COMMENTS: "I am doing this because I want to know more about my great grandfather. His name was Donald Beedy and his son (my grandfather) was Harold James Beedy. My father was adopted by him, My father's name is Gary Beedy. I don't know their siblings... but if you are related to these people, contact me at [email protected] please because I would like to know more about my family." DeAnna Bersell lives in Dunkirk, NY.

LINEAGE: "My great-great-great grandparents: William Beede (b: 4/9/1824 in Vermont d: 6/3/1888 in Hartland, MN) married Cynthia S. Sleeper (b: March 1823 in NH d: 1/30/1903 in Mankato, MN)

My great-great grandparents: Freedom D. Beede (b: December 1858 in Hartland, MN d: date unknown but in MN) married Sylvia Garlock (b: July 1867 in MN d: date and place unknown by myself) around 1895 probably in Freeborn County MN.

My great grandparents: Freedom D. Beede (b: 3/18/1887 in MN d: 7/11/1963 in St Louis Park, MN) married Gladys S Russell (b: about 1900 in MN d: 12/20/1970 in MN) about 1919.

My grandparents: DeMarle W Beede (b: 3/2/1920 Rice Lake, MN d: 7/18/2005 place unknown to myself) married Virginia (maiden name unknown to myself b: date unknown d: December 1994)."

COMMENTS: THIS IS AS FAR BACK AS I CAN GET ON MY LINEAGE SINCE MY GREAT GREAT GREAT GRANDFATHER WILLIAM IS PRETTY MUCH LISTED AS HAVING NO PARENTS THAT ARE KNOWN OF. His lineage is Delbert Eugene BEEDE, his father > Freedom Delbert > Freedom D. > William Jr. > William. He and his cousin DeAnna (above) are still searching for their connection to Eli. Katrina H.
